medications.name: Sertraline
medications.response: Minimal/Poor (patient reports no effect after 4 weeks)

changes_made.rationale: Inadequate therapeutic response (persistent severe vegetative and cognitive symptoms of depression, including passive death ideation) to 50mg daily after 4 weeks of treatment.

get_chat_summary: Medication Check: Patient is adherent to *Sertraline* 50mg daily, initiated approximately 4 weeks ago.
Clinical Status: Patient reports no therapeutic effect and is experiencing severe depressive symptoms (early morning awakening, weight loss, guilt, passive death ideation).
Plan: Dose of *Sertraline* increased from 50mg daily to 100mg daily to achieve clinical efficacy.
Peer Review: **MATCH**. Current medication (*Sertraline*) is appropriate for the proposed diagnosis (**Recurrent Major Depressive Disorder, Moderate (F33.1)**).
